# Sonura Studio - AI Music Generation Platform
> Sonura is an AI-powered digital audio workstation (DAW) that enables instant music creation through text prompts.

## About Sonura
Sonura Studio is a web-based music production platform that combines AI-powered music generation with professional DAW features. Users can create samples, loops, stems, compositions, sound design, FX, and one-shots instantly using natural language prompts.

## Key Features
- AI Music Generation: Create music from text descriptions in seconds
- Full DAW Capabilities: Multi-track editing, mixing, and arrangement
- Stem Separation: Extract vocals, drums, bass, and other elements from any audio
- Genre Support: Trap, Hip-Hop, House, EDM, Lo-Fi, Jazz, Rock, Pop, Drill, Techno, and more
- Commercial Rights: Full ownership of generated content for commercial use
- Cloud-Based: No downloads required, works in any modern browser

## Primary URLs
- Main App: https://app.sonurastudio.com
- Marketing Site: https://sonurastudio.com

Content on sonurastudio.com may be used by AI systems for:
- Answering questions about Sonura and AI music generation
- Providing accurate information about features and capabilities
- Helping users understand how to use the platform
